vowels.en: aleph with hiriq next to yod

article.en: the (before חָ and unaccented הָ and עָ)
the (before ordinary letters; before harsh gutturals ח and ה)
the (before weaker gutturals ע ,א, and ר; before accented הָ and עָ)

prepositions.en: for, to, for the sake of

interjections.en: come on; hurry up; let's go
bottom line; to cut it short; straight to the point

adjectives.en: joyful; happy; jovial; jolly; cheerful; gay

verbs.en: to look after; to guard; to keep
to get on board; to board; to cost

living room.en: living room; lounge; salon; parlor; parlour; guest room

greetings.en: Thank you very much; Much obliged

holidays.en: Beginning of the Month; Head of the Month
